title: OpenAI入股Thrive Holdings以加速企业AI应用
description: OpenAI入股Thrive Holdings以加速企业AI应用，将前沿研究与工程直接融入会计和IT服务，旨在提升速度、准确性和效率，同时为全行业转型创建一个可扩展的模型。
titleZh: OpenAI入股Thrive Holdings以加速企业AI应用
titleEn: OpenAI takes stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI applications
descriptionZh: OpenAI入股Thrive Holdings以加速企业AI应用，将前沿研究与工程直接融入会计和IT服务，旨在提升速度、准确性和效率，同时为全行业转型创建一个可扩展的模型。
descriptionEn: OpenAI invests in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI applications, integrating cutting-edge research and engineering directly into accounting and IT services, aiming to improve speed, accuracy and efficiency while creating a scalable model for industry-wide transformation.
